movies.title: Pikachu's PikaBoo
movies.originalTitle: Pocket Monster: Pikachû no dokidoki kakurenbo

biography.bio: Ikue Ôtani was born on August 18, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998).
biography.name: Ikue Ôtani

biography.bio: Satomi Kôrogi was born on November 14, 1966 in Chiba, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Pokémon (1997) and Twin Princess of Wonder Planet (2005).
biography.name: Satomi Kôrogi

biography.bio: Madeleine Blaustein was born on October 9, 1960 in Queens, New York, USA as Adam Seth Blaustein. She was an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999). She died on December 11, 2008 in Jersey City, New Jersey, USA.
biography.name: Madeleine Blaustein

biography.bio: Michael Haigney was born on August 6, 1956 in Upland, California, USA as Michael J. Haigney. He is an actor and writer, known for Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998), Pokémon (1997) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Michael Haigney

biography.bio: Eric Stuart was born on October 18, 1967 in Brooklyn, New York, USA. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon 3: The Movie (2000). He is married to Jenna Malizia.
biography.name: Eric Stuart

biography.bio: Tara Sands was born on September 20, 1974 in Hartford, Connecticut, USA as Tara Jayne Sands. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Barbie: Life in the Dreamhouse (2012) and Cartoon Cartoon Fridays (2000).
biography.name: Tara Sands

biography.bio: Veronica Taylor was born on December 4, 1965 in the USA as Kathleen C. McInerney. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon 3: The Movie (2000).
biography.name: Veronica Taylor

biography.bio: Kayzie Rogers is an actress and director, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Kayzie Rogers

actors.character: Cyndaquil / Totodile / Wobbuffet / Azurill / Sunflora / Corsola

biography.bio: Amy Birnbaum was born on April 14, 1975. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Monsters (2000) and Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998).
biography.name: Amy Birnbaum

biography.bio: Rodger Parsons was born on October 19, 1943 in Stonington, Connecticut, USA. He is an actor, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back (1998) and Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999).
biography.name: Rodger Parsons

biography.bio: Rikako Aikawa was born on October 7, 1967 in Kanagawa, Japan as Nahomi Kawazoe. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaiketsu zorori (2004) and Paprika (2006). She is married to Mitsuo Iwata.
biography.name: Rikako Aikawa

biography.bio: Kumiko Endô was born on April 8, 1978 in Saitama, Japan. She is an actress, known for Tokyo Raiders (2000), Welcome Back, Mr. McDonald (1997) and Tomie: Re-birth (2001). She has been married to Hatsuki Yokoo since July 2016. They have one child.
biography.name: Kumiko Endô

biography.bio: Megumi Hayashibara was born on March 30, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Paprika (2006), Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001) and Neon Genesis Evangelion: The End of Evangelion (1997). She has been married to Amiya Masaharu since April 30, 1998.
biography.name: Megumi Hayashibara

biography.bio: Inuko Inuyama was born on December 16, 1965 in Tokyo, Japan as Chie Tozuka. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Pokémon the Series: Ruby and Sapphire (2002) and Pokémon the Series: Diamond and Pearl (2006).
biography.name: Inuko Inuyama

biography.bio: Mika Kanai was born on March 18, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Pokémon (1997), Kaitou Saint Tail (1995) and Hinamizawa, le village maudit (2006). She was previously married to Kôichi Yamadera.
biography.name: Mika Kanai
